content.detailedDescription:
I go outside to have a cigarette or two every night, and i love to stare at the stars.. and i have seen satellites and helicopters and planes and know the difference between stars and planes.. but there is one star in particular, that begins moving, it will shoot up, then back down, then go in circles.. and the star i usually use as a reference point for it, moves with it sometimes as well. 
this star is very bright, a bright cobalt blue with a very bright shinning white.. and yet sometimes it looks like there are little rotating flashes of red and green. it gets brighter and brighter sometimes and looks like its spotlighting you or something. 
i see this every night i go outside.. there is also a red star that will move around as well. these stars appear every night over my house.. and i know that stars flicker and get brighter, and things throughout the night, but this is different. this night was different because the bright star would flash, and then a star to it's right would flash and then another to the left like they were in order, responding to each other.

i feel crazy, describing it to my friends, even now, but it happens every night.. sometimes it feels like they are trying to communicate with me, but i realize how selfish and crazy that sounds. but do other people see moving stars? 

i know it sounds odd, but i feel like they are trying to get my attention.. i feel like they have revealed themselves to me, and i don't know what else to do. i see them every night! and i can point them out every night, i know where they are at all hours with the rotation of the earth. i just dont know what the point of showing me is. what am i supposed to do with this? im saving to buy a better video camera that can record these dancing stars, so i can show my friends i'm not nuts. but i wanted to step up and ask some people who are pros on the subject o ufo's..
i'd really appreciate any kind of help or explanation, i feel like im going crazy.. but i know what i have seen, i just dont know what it is :) thank you for your time.
content.summary: Stars that appear every night in the sky, and "dance" around

content.detailedDescription: My dad was driving me back from walmart, and as we were nearing 64th to cross to our side, i saw an orange circular thing in the air and pointed it out to him, we watched it move while we were driving to our house, and i never lost sight of it. i saw it because i always look up at the sky when you can see the stars. at first i though it was maybe a small hot air balloon because it was a fire-like orange, but it wasn't flickering like a fire would. the object was also moving from north to south at a pretty good pace even though there was no wind at all. then it came within 50 feet of a small airplane, and my dad was yelling "oh my god it's gonna hit it," but it barely missed it and then my dad thought it had disappeared or gone out because he thought it was a small hot air balloon still, but i saw it still until it was too small to see it any longer. after it had passed the plane, it gained speed very rapidly and went into the night sky at about a 45 degree angle. i was scared at first because i do believe in intelligent beings visiting us, but i was also happy partially because my dad has always put me down for believing that. i ran inside really fast because i was scared, nothing i've ever seen in the sky has scared me that much. i lost the object because it went beyond my eyes capabilities.
content.summary: Orange ball missed plane bolted off

content.detailedDescription: We were coming out of work which is located on the north side of the city of kewaunee. as we walked across the parking lot someone yelled to me to look up in the western sky and tell them what the hell they were seeing. looking up i saw a gold, spikey, shaped ball coming towards us at app. 1000 ft. another worker came up and she and i saw the object turn towards the southeast and accelerate very quickly. reaching our location and now being ball shaped( looking at it from the side) the goldish blue light suddenly disappeared and two tiny white lights appeared to flash on and off taking only a couple of seconds to do so. after that it was gone from our sight. the weather at the time was clear with numerous stars being seen. temperature about 10 degrees. object was seen by 3 people. duration app. 30 sec. feelings were more of curiousity than anything else.
content.summary: Gold ball at 1000 ft traveling towards lake michigan

content.detailedDescription:
To my right of orion's belt there was a star looking object that was significantly brighter than any of the other stars. it flickered green, blue, white, and red. i believe it was around early 1am, or late 12 am. 
we thought it could have been a plane, but it was staying in the same area for too long. sporadically it would move in circular motions, or make fast jets to the left and right or just hover there. the flickering of the lights didn't look like a glowing dot, but gave the object little flares simulating a star. once we got outside, we realized there was another one, but it was much further away.
content.summary: Looked like 2 flashing stars flickering color, moving around.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were sitting in the living room reading and watching television early evening when my daughter said ,dad have you noticed the  ceiling light is getting dimmer and dimmer.I said i have noticed it for about the last twenty minutes .Thinking it may be faulty i turned the light off from the switch on the wall.Later my wife daughter and myself retired for the night and said our goodnights to each other.I awoke from my sleep i think about one or two o,clock the next morning and noticed that my wife had gone to the lounge room to get some sleep because of my snoaring.When i was walking down the hallway i noticed the light was on again in the lounge room ,my fist thought was that it had still had some life in it and went to turn it off but remembered i,d turned it off earlier that night, thinking my wife may have turned it on  i went to turn it off again but to my surprise it was still in the off  position.I walked over to my wife to ask her if she wanted to return back to the bedroom with me but as i went to touch her a small flash of light flashed in front of my face that startled me,not knowing what it was i turn my head slightly to my left when it flashed in front of me again.I thought it might have been lightening so as i went to look outside the house it flashed again in front of me .It was  the size of a golf ball and left a shock wave as it flashed.I went out door to see if it could
 be from an approaching storm but there was not a cloud in sight. i decided to leave my wife where she lay on the lounge and returned to bed ,where i layed thinking what was it was that i had just seen.About one hour had passed when my entire bedroom flashed a light so bright i did not think possible .Now i am starting to become concerned as to what is happening in the house.Then twenty to thirty minutes later it flashed again but stayed on for about three seconds, it was so bright i could not see any furniture, windows ,wall prints  not anything not even the door or ceiling cornice, for a short time i felt frozen but not with fear but with amazement at what i was wittnesing.I lept from my bed and went out to check on my wife and daugher i went to my wife first and told her to get up and wait there for me but she went straight to the bedroom in her awoken slumber i then went to my daughters bedroom and woke her also and took her to my bedroom with me and my wife.The next morning i told my wife what had happened that early morning and she the had remembed that she had also seen flashing lights in our walk in robe and thought it was me turning the lights on and off  but then remembed that i was in my daughters room waking her.My daughter noticed us talking and wanted to know what it was that we were dicussing, when i told her she replied that she had seen the same flashing lights but thought i was me or my wife just playing with the lights in the hallway out side her room  but it was not us. i have been confused as to what these  lights were untill one night sitting in the yard i saw the same flash of light in the night sky it had the same shock wave as it disappead i truely believe that this light had a great deal of intelegence as it was able to manipulate our living room light.I have seen four other  ufo,s with wittneses
content.summary: Lights and flashers in the house

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on a dark road near my rural santa cruz county home at a little after 7pm, i round a corner and was faced with an obvious, couldn't have missed it if i tried, scenario.  above and beyond the hillside separating the road from the beach, about five to ten miles away, at about 3000 to 5000 feet, i was blown away by the dramatic and unexplainable phenomena hovering and flashing at a slow and steady rate - on and off. 

i pulled off to the side of the road - after a minute, i got out of my car to watch more effectively. the flashing orb must have hovered and shone it brilliant bright, yet soft while light, for about three or four minutes. 

i began to feel as though it sensed my awareness and consequently, felt a bit of fear star to hit me. however, it was far enough away, that i had a certain sense of safety. 

anyway, after about four or five minutes, the flashing orb powered down to a fraction of its original brilliance. at this point, the hovering ended and the dimming light began moving away from the ocean and toward the interior. 

as it got further away, it had smaller red lights involved in some way or another.

this was an event that launched me into a whole new stratosphere of determination to do my part to help people prepare for the changes we are experiencing in an ongoing manner. however, the changes we are facing could very well require a level of wisdom and intelligence that goes beyond the kind of cleverness that has succeeded in the past. 

as eckhart tolle said: intelligence joins, cleverness divides.
content.summary: Bright orb flashing on and off while hovering - eventually powers down, after dropping a light to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: Was out rabbit hunting beteen the hours of 2130 cdt to about 2315 cdt on a farm outside of maud , oklahoma. it was a clear and cold night with a qauter moon out. i was armed with an a pump -action tactical shotgun and a kimber 5in. 45. cal. pistal along with about 100 rounds of 45 and 45 shotgun rounds. both weapons are equiped with high end wight lighits. upon returning to my home , about 2315 cdt, i walked up on my patio which is about 5 feet off the ground. when i saw a large human like figure that was bigger then any man i ever saw. i used the surefire white light on my shotgun to see better. due to light fog, i could only see about 25 feet with the light. the creature was out in the open enough to see an outline of the figure. i had seen all my animals act unsual pior, a feeling of being wacthed at hours of darkness on more then one time. the figure was wacthing me and made eye contact. it was very large and close to 7 to 8 feet tall , was very stocky build, would guess over  400 lbs. the figure seemed anyoed that i pointed my shotgun at it. seemed to have no fear of me or my animals. to inculed a military trained dog. my dog cowared down and would not respond to commands. i did contact a " bigfoot team " that showed up within 72 hours of this. no evidence was found. no footprints, hair, nothhing. i did experince some lapse in memory there after. i am a ret. special forces sniper with 10 yrs. experince and 3 tours in iraq. to inculed the iraq invasion with the 3 rd inf. div. on the frontlines. i have no knowlede after all i seen and done to descripe this figure. i do need to be kept out of any public report becuse of my background and security cleacnce with the military. i just want answers and will provide full croporation in person . the biggest thing that bothers me is the lack of fear from the figure and my fear back . i fear very little in life. just want to get to the bottom of this.
content.summary: Had close encounter less than 40 feet or 20 yards

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on mount putman avenue in the clairemont area of san diego.  i was looking at orion's belt and a light caught my eye.  at first i thought it was a satellite so i watched for a few seconds and saw it flast (nothing extraordinarily bright) twice and thought it was an iridium sattelite - i remember thinking "cool - just saw a flash of light off of a sattelite".  the point of light stopped, then i thought that i had just lost sight of it.  the light then accelerated suddenly heading due west.

i don't know what altitude it was at as it was just a point of light (no shape or multiple lights).  however, it was high enough that the acceleration was quite astounding.  in the space of a couple of seconds it was out of sight.  it didn't just go from a dead stop to the final speed but seemed to "rev" up (at arms length the "rev up" time took about from the tip of my thumb to my index finger with my fingers as wide apart as i can stretch them - i was describing the "what ever it was" to someone and used that as an example about 5 minutes after i witnessed this).  the sighting lasted only about 1 minute from the time i noticed it, the flashes, then the sudden acceleration.

it wasn't dramatic to witness and would be lost unless you happened to be looking at exactly the right place at the right time.  just an interesting little sighting of something.  have drawn no conclusions other than it was out of the ordinary.

thank you,

[witness name removed cms/dr]
content.summary: Satellite in brightness, 2 flashes, stopped then sudden acceleration

content.detailedDescription: Last night at about 11:46 my wife and i was standing out when we saw a bright green flash that seemed to light the hole sky. this is not the first thing that we have seen back in aug. we were out side when 7 bright lights went across the sky going the same way and then around 4am my wife had told me that she had seen another light that was low to the ground with no sound so she says it could not be a plane. then abuot a week ago i was out in me yard when i saw a bright light flash like a crama flash but it was way to high. that one was by the little dipper.
content.summary: Bright green flash

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in new hope, pa during the summer of 2008. i frequently look up when i'm outside at night because you just never know what you might see. i had gone outside my house to smoke a cigarette and just sit and stare up at the sky.  then, i heard the distant sound of approaching military jets. this was not unusual because we're not too far from the willow grove naval air station. well, i looked up and saw the two fighter jets, possibly f-117's but that was not what caught my attention. between the two military jets and a little above them, there was a triangular craft just like a lot of the sketches i see reports of people seeing. actually, it looked almost exactly like the triangular craft from the famous blurry photograph taken over belgium in the 1980's i believe. what struck me was that i could hear the distinct sound of the two jets which sounded like they were coasting into the willow grove naval air station. i heard no other sounds. i assumed it was a military craft because it was being escorted by the jets making every movement with them. 

also, i could tell the triangular craft had lights at the corners and one round one right in the center of the bottom. the thing was, the lights weren't shining. they did look like they were on but it was like they were shifted a bit out of our spectrum. i had a very clear view of the craft but it seemed to be "grayed out" or something. the lights seemed on but they weren't shining like a regular light source. i was a little excited at the time i didn't think much of it because i just figured it was a military black project. but, now i'm seeing more and more things about people seeing this thinking it's from outer space. i believe it to be a military aircraft and completely terrestrial. i wanted to report my sighting to you to give you another point of view from someone who has also seen this object. it came to mind tonight while i watched a program on tv about the ufo flap in the summer of 2008. unfortunately, i didn't take any pictures because for one, it was in the middle of the night and i didn't have a good camera at the time. i carry my camera with me at all times now.
content.summary: Triangular craft with military escort

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on interstate 5 close to mt. shasta around 3:30 pm and i noticed a strange shape in the sky that seemed to be a very strange looking "cloud". at the time, there were no other clouds in the sky. my wife is so interested in ufo's it seemed only right for me to stop at the upcoming rest area and get pictures of this strange ufo-shaped cloud. it remained in the sky for quite some time and i took a few pictures.  there were other people there that saw me taking pictures with my cell phone, they saw what i was looking at and also began taking pictures.  i could not help but to feel a strange drain of energy from my body... i became suddenly depressed after the experience. anyways, i got a few pictures and decided i needed to show them to everyone i could. this was by far one of the strangest experiences i've ever had.
content.summary: Obviously not a cloud!

content.detailedDescription: While outside i notice many birds flying in and i didnt think this was abnormal till millions of birds came upon me i was standing on old hickory lake observing a cloud coming in this was still not concerning to me until the birds started coming and landing upon me like they were afraid of something then a freak snowstorm hit and i wonder if it was that that triggered the birds because i would guestimate 100000 birds are outside freaking out over something i do have video of the event under utube paranormal bird event if you care to watch there was no ufo but these birds gave me some impending disaster feeling especially scincethey landed on me and tried to come in the house
content.summary: Not a ufo but animal event

content.detailedDescription: Monday feb 7 at aprox 7:30opm we were eating dinner, my 13 year old saw a very large green light out the window and asked what it was..So i went in the back yard and saw a giant green light and i think at least 2 large red lights flashing, i didnt see a shape, it looked like a cluster of pulsating lights slow moving west. my daughter came outand says she thought it had a outline of oval and or boomerag shape. we  both tried to take a picture and video with our cell phones and we couldnt, it wouldnt come out on the camera.  i tried so many times for like 15 min., i didnot hear any noise from the object, but my daughter thought it was like a swooshing water sound. it moved slowly towards the coast near malibu it looked like and then it seemed to go over a hill and then there was a flashing red light that stayed there all night. i have  looked outside last night and noticed that the small flashing red light on the hill is always there, must be like a coast guard light. we have seen some white lights on january 24, 2011 up here in a triangular shape, but that seems to be very common on these sites. this was very different, it was huge...Something i have never seen before. i did check out to see if maybe it could be one of those military planes, but it moved so slowly , almost stationary...So i dont think it was anything from this planet..I noticed today that other people may have seen what i saw in my area, in los angeles...I would love to compare notes...My email is *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Very large red and green pulsating lights /slow moving

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way home from las vegas, nv after a bowling tournament.  we drove.  stopped to take photos of interesting rock formations. i was taking this photo when the object crossed my field of vision.  it was so fast that my camera was only able to capture the blurr in the lt section of my photo.  there was no sound.  nothing we have is that fast without sound or exhaust trail.  i was extremely impressed with the technology of those that in control of this craft.  it was gone after i looked in the direction of it's flight path.  would love to see this craft again.  there was no fear.  only awe.
content.summary: Stopped to photo rock formations

content.detailedDescription:
I witnesses an extraordinary event monday evening after arriving home from the store. apprx time parked in front of house per car time, 7:36pm. after getting out of the car i looked up at the sky as i normally do, it was a very clear night sky with stars and normal air traffic. however, what caught my eye was this...I parked the car on the northside of the street directly in front of our home, car facing west. we have a completely large field of view of the sky full 360 with almost no obstruction from tall trees during the winter. anyway, i reached the sidewalk and looked up facing west and noticed just past a tall street tree, 2 red lights (not flashing) but 1 one each end of a straight invisible line, appear, move and turn slightly toward my direction but then as if banking a u turn, shift its angle and hovered for a moment then at a very slow and steady speed, begin to move forward going south (heading toward the queen mary area, dwntwn long beach) down the path of the 710 s fwy. cross frwys 91/710 main streets long beach blvd/artesiablvd.

i have to say this. it has been known that the military has increased their activities in the area off the coast and flight patterns from long beach/ san pedro areas straight towards or past burbank/pasadena with military battle copters to jets f15s etc. tonight, this object made no sound. it was low flying less than 1000 feet just like the.Police/military helicopters have been flying over our homes...It's wingspan equaled to that of a football/track field but the length/distance of the two lights expanded further away from each other at a point 3 blocks from me, then just barely missing a small plane just leaving the long beach airport due nw, changed its altitude just in time to fly over the plane. i remember seeing atleast 3 planes flying around just after this object appeared. then the air traffic picked up with a helicopter coming. i did try to videotape with my android epic phone. the object would not pickup on camera except for the small plane. i called for my eldest son, 19, to come out to see this. he did...But by this time, apprx 7min passed the object had picked up speed and the two lights had shifted and moved around and came closure together in tbe distance mimicking that of a vehicles two red brake lights with the exception that they were blinking red at a much faster rate. i was hesitant to post this info. i hope that some one else saw this too. i have witnessed other ufo sightings since i was a kid. this was amazing as it had just appeared to show itself to me. example. i though i was viewing 2 large stars that were very far apart from each other in the sky, near orion's belt. that's when it moved.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 fast blinking red lights set apart on an aray effect. straight line like a giant airplane wing span with 1 red light at each tip of a wing. low flying in my area.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late and i was standing outside in my backyard smoking a cigarette, during this time my friends were coming over. i was staring at the stars because it was such a clear night. when i was looking up i saw for a couple seconds a glowing flash with a shape of a ship. it was flying very fast, i've never seen anything fly that fast before. i was shocked and my eyes instantly started to get very watery. i also felt like i froze in motion. in a way i felt like i was having a psychedelic experience, i had an extreme feeling of awareness and a lonely feeling. my friends then came over and we talked about aliens and ufo's for about 3 hours. one of my friends had already seen 3 ufo's. we then realized their was a sighting in san bruno a couple weeks before. the video is on youtube. but it didn't look anything like the one i saw. i believe aliens will visit us and help us rejuvenate the earth, i don't believe they are here to harm us.


*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: White glowing more rounded version of an american b2 bomber

content.detailedDescription:
I have and intense passion for anything other-wordly. i've had several sightings within the past year and the very first one pushed me into making ufo chasing a hobby. tonight i wasn't even looking really. tonight's purpose was to console my best friend who is going through a rough time at the moment. we did some back country driving and venting and out of the corner of my eye i spotted it (a small gold colored orb) . i pointed it out to my friend (who is also interested in this hobby) and she was amazed. it hovered still as if it might be observing. i flashed my brights at it and then it took off with great speed. it was gone. no where to be seen. so out of curiosity i decided to go in the direction where it went. it appeared again as a bright star and the closer we got to it, it drifted away but still remained the same size and shape but it still seemed like one of them "door at the end of the tunnel" situations. once we reached an intersection we finally caught up to it. it sat stationary over a large field with no trees or houses. at this point we noticed that it had a pulsating bright red light along with the white light. it did not blink like and air plane would. very lovely. i decided to take a right down another road because i could not go straight toward it since the road cut off at the intersection. i turned around on a whim and noticed that the object was now following us!!! gleee!!! i found a driveway and turned around to face it and then it started going back in the other direction. i was a little upset by this and then out of curiosity i turned my brights off. after that it stopped and sat there. i get the feeling that whatever it was wasnt very fond of bright lights. this ufo friend hung around for the majority of the night...Like a watcher. very interesting and fun indeed. 

second sighting of the evening: this one stands out the most to me and is also very important to me because this is a new style of sighting and one of the most interesting that i've seen. after playing tag with the first one we noticed 3 dim orbs off in the distance that slowly inched toward each other. they were horizontal in the horizon and resembled a formation that of orions belt. the second orb and the third orb came together with the first orb and created one very large and very very bright orb! the orb would grow dim and very bright....Dim and very bright....And than disappeared completely. 

after this we stopped at a gas station and then decided to head back home. on the way home we were followed by two of these orbs up until about a few miles from home.

folks of southern wisco....Someone had to have seen this too..At least id hope so...People seem to take the sky for granted these days and tend to keep their head down but never upward toward the possibilities....But there are a handful of you out there with an open mind...Don't be afraid to come forward if you've seen anything tonight as well.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I think i got their attention.

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen strange triangle crafts before, while camping in the seqouia's. so, when i saw the same type of triangle craft right over my house this past monday, i was excited! it was around eightish at night and i was getting ready to get inside and put the dogs in. my wife was causally watching t.V. inside the house as usual. i like to stay outside and watch the stars on a daily basis, almost like a hobby. reason being is, because in the past i've seen many odd unkown objects in the sky and always wanted to know more. so, on this evening i was recalling upon my expierence when i was camping with my family at kern river. at kern river is where i first expierenced the triangles.

anyways, back to my house as i was standing up watching the stars i was thinking to myself. man, would be great to see those traingle crafts again!! i was thinking i might never get to see them again, but at least i got to see them once. as, i walked to my door to go in i looked up one more time just in case. right, then and there i saw it again!!!! i was really excited and really looked at the triangle craft as best and as long as i could. the traingle craft was really low to ground and was completly silent. the craft was about as high up in the sky as a typical airplane would be flying. as, i was looking at the craft i yelled out to my wife. come outside, come outside it's here.... loook!!! my wife, was scared and decided not to get up because she didnt want to freak out. i ran to front of my house and followed it in the sky for as long as i could, i have a neighbor who's also open to u.F.O.'s. i screamed to her and said look up there here, see!! she was preoccupied at the time because she was on the phone and ended up missing it. the triangle craft was very large, to me it seems like a mothership type or commander type craft, because of it's size. i would say it's as large as football field or bigger. the size was so big i knew it wasn't from this world. the thing about these crafts is there also, nearly invisible. it's like the craft has a invisible cloaking device. it looked like a solid triangle object but, at the same time you could see through it. on both end tips of the triangle craft there was bright red flashing light's. the light's seemed to have a sequence to it, an example would be the red lights flickered in a wierd pattern, then switched back to a simple on/off mode. as, i was still standing in the middle of the street  with my neighbor the craft vanished into the dark sky headed towards palos verdes, ca. this was a exciting night hope it helps out and thanks for reading!
i computerized a triangle craft so everyone can get a feel of the real deal.
content.summary: Huge black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home after spending time with my aunt at that time i lived in springfield.As i came down a hill working my way toward  rte 57,i avoided the  center of town because there was a fireman's carnival was going on.It was approximately 10:30pm.
 as i came down a small hill at the end of depot st,my radio in the car became scratchy,and eventually went out .This had never happened  before so i wondered what was going on that made it work inproperly. i still headed  toward  rte 57.I  came to  the corner,which had  a  school on  one  corner  and diagonally across the  street was a corn field.As i looked toward the left to make  sure there were no cars coming in  from the left i saw a ufo hovering just above the corn.I thought it  was an  attraction  from  the carnival so i did not pay any attention  to it. over toward my right on  a small strip of grass were about 25 people,among them  was my uncle david,so i tooted  the  horn  and  went along my way toward home.When  i  arrived  home my mother  asked   why i was so late in getting home.It was  3 am!I was not  aware that i had lost  three and a half hours. i have no  conscious memory of any unusual occurance.I had insisted to my mother i was not late in getting home,that i had left at  10:30pm.
recently i was chatting  with my  aunt about seeing this and she told me in 1972 she saw a ufo  along college highway.I said "wow" and went on  with my day.
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering  over a corn field-many people present

content.detailedDescription:
This story could have very easily been made up. one might think that, perhaps, it's the delusion of someone hoping to have a ufo experience of his own. but, i tell you the truth when i say this, from what i've been reading about these things, they are not good. they are not what they seem. the fruits of their actions only reveal bad intention. i would like to think that i did not see what i saw, that this story isn't true. but it is.

my roommate and i just got back from the humane society where we picked up a dog and i went to the back porch to smoke a cigarette. i had remembered that earlier i had seen a rainbow, so i looked around in the clouds to see if it was still visible. it was not.

instead, i saw an orb of light moving around. it seemed about the size of a small or distant plane flying, but it contained itself to a single area and maneuvered too quickly around to be a planethe event was occurring just above a line of trees, so i watched to see if it was a kite or something, but then i noticed another circle. and in another few seconds another and another. soon (within 20 seconds of the first sighting) there were 7+ orbs flying around in that area. none of them were rising from the ground, but gathering together from other parts of the sky. all of them were flying around each other. if these were kites, surely the strings would have tangled together and i would have seen them crashing to the ground. they did not.

i have been reading different books about ufo's recently (communion by streiber, redfern's final events, and a few books by l.A. marzulli) so i'm not surprised that my first interpretation of the event was "ufos." but, because the very name indicates ignorance, i kept watching to see whether these orbs would begin showing behavior typical of some explainable object. they did not.

they continued their dance in the sky and i continued to watch them. i had no other camera on me but my phone camera, which would not have been able to zoom in close enough to capture an image of these orbs. after 8-9 minutes, i went inside and called for my roommate to "come, see this!" i had hoped for another eye-witness to this event. i went back outside and turned my attention back to the sky, but to my dismay, all but one had disappeared and just as my roommate stepped back onto the porch, that one flew into the cover of the clouds and could no longer be seen. the rainbow was again visible, however.

we went back inside where i told him the story of what happened and he told me that it sounded like something that he saw years back.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light orb reconnaissance

content.detailedDescription:
I'm reporting this event for my son who is 10yrs old. he does homework in the kitchen, on the west side of the house. we are half an hour from o'hare and he knows the difference between commercial air traffic and something else. he was sitting at the kitchen table working on homework facing the west window.  

i walked in and he had this serene but perplexed look on his face and just calmly said, "dad, i think i just saw a ufo". i said, ok.. what did you see? 

he said... "i looked up from my homework and saw this glow and it looked different from a plane. i got up and walked to the window by the sink and saw this glowing oval shaped light just sitting there. then it started to move slowly *south (*i'm adding clarification of direction) and then zipped away super fast, way faster than a jet. then about thirty seconds later, i saw a black jet like my model jet zoom past in the direction the light went"

now... we were not talking about ufos, i was busy in my office, on a conference call, working. we have not watched or discussed ufos or aliens recently. while he described this to me, there was plenty of traffic coming from o'hare. so, as a jet approached from the west, they fly directly towards and over our neighborhood, i asked if the light was sparkling like the headlights on the planes. he said it was dull and tried to adjust the light over the kitchen table to duplicate it. then i asked him to tell me when one of the approaching jets were about the same distance. as he indicated what the distance seemed to be, i asked how much bigger or smaller the light was. he said several times larger.

a little later i told him that i was playing a trick on him and that i was shining a flashlight in the window. he said, "dad, you'd be like in the guiness book of world records for special effects". i said i was just kidding. he said, "i know what i saw and you could not have faked the jet going by afterwards either". i also asked him to stare off into the distance and count out the time it took for the jet to fly by in the direction of the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellowish oval light

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a satelite like objest that flashed every 12 seconds similar to a aircraft strobe. was completly stationary. i viewed the object for ten minutes. i know for sure object was ar extremly high altitude if not in orbit. was located in the cancer constellation. i have spent my life viewing the stars and aircraft. i know for sure this was not an.Aircraft satellite or natural happening.

when i first noticed the object i was on the phone watching the stars.
content.summary: Saw stationary orb that pulsated every 12 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
Two silver disks observed in broad daylight.

the following event took place nearly 49 years ago. i was nine years old at the time of the event. it happened in mid summer, and in broad daylight. there were two witnesses to the sighting, myself, and a friend that i will refer to as willy.

at the time, i lived very near one of the largest hills in haverhill, mass. we called the hill, tilton's tower, because at one time there had stood a large, brick viewing tower atop the hill. the tower was long gone by 1962, and in its place was a large (200 ft. +/-) radio transmission tower, which was used to broadcast our local am radio station. if it was used for anything else, i know not. the entire hill was otherwise devoid of any houses or buildings. it was a great place for us neighborhood kids to play and explore.

on a bright, sunny, august day, my friend willy and me decided to hike up to the top of the hill. we had made our own bows and arrows, by bending a branch for a bow, and using the straightest sticks we could find, as arrows. "come on, let's go to the top of tilton's tower," i said, "maybe we can shoot a rabbit." willy and i climbed to the top where the grass was nearly waist high. we walked through the tall grass hoping to flush out a rabbit, but alas, the only thing jumping were grasshoppers.

so that we might make some use of our bows and arrows, i got the idea that we could shoot our arrows straight up into the sky, and see whose arrow would go the farthest.

"okay!", said willy, "i'll bet mine'll go higher than yours!" we both drew back on our bows and pointing our arrows straight up. "reday", i said, "aim... fire!" "they went about the same height", willy said. "okay, let's try it again", i said. so, again we pulled back as hard as we could on our bow strings, pointed our arrows up toward the sky and.... "hey!" i yelled, "what's that?" i lowered my bow, but kept my gaze straight up, for there in the bright blue sky, was a silvery, shiny disk darting this way and that. "hey! do you see that?" "yes", willie replied.

the disk was bright silver, perfectly round, and moving in a zig zag pattern, that gave me the impression of the movement of a gyroscope, or the wobble of a top. it tipped slightly, banked, moved forward and side to side. the speed was rapid in its zig zag movements, and it was totally noiseless. the sun was nearly directly overhead (in fact, i recall putting our hand above our eyes to aid in seeing), and it almost seemed to be playing tag with the sun. we stood and watched it for a minute or two. the size was about what a dime would be at arms length.

"what is it?", i said. "i don't know... a flying saucer.", said willie. suddenly, the first one was joined by a second. "hey look! now there's two of them!!" i shouted. the two disks moved close to one another at the same altitude. while their movements were quite erratic, and while they crossed paths with each other, they didn't collide. they both remained pretty much overhead during the entire sighting period. then... in an instant... they were gone! "they're gone!" said willy. "yeah, where did they go?", i asked. we scanned the sky, but the two disks were no where to be seen.

needless to say, we hurriedly made our way down the hill. i've never forgotten that day. it is something that i haven't discussed much to anyone, although i have asked willy, and he too remembers the incident quite well. there is no doubt in my mind that the two disks that we both saw were real. beyond a doubt, these were solid, controlled, flying objects, and could not have been anything else. i consider myself very fortunate to have had this experience.
content.summary: 2 silver discs seen in broad daylight - 1962

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1966, i was spending a couple of weeks at my grandmother���s house in mashhad, iran.  one day, over breakfast, my grandmother told me of a light she had seen the night before. she had gotten up in the middle of the night and saw a ball of light descend and stop on top of the dome of imam reza shrine.  she added that the light had lingered motionless over the dome for a period of time and then descended into the dome.  she had watched for a while and then had gone back to bed.

when i asked her what she thought it was, she said ���it must have been angel gabriel coming to visit the imam.���

to my recollection, my grandmother was not given to any particular religious sentiment and would have no reason to make such a story up.  i believe she was simply using the only description that would make any sense based on the culture that she was in.  if anything, she was very pragmatic and well focused on the business of day-to-day life.

i have been meaning to write about this and other ���ufo��� experiences for a couple of months now.  in light of the reports of 28 january, 2011 over jerusalem, i feel it is important to post the above information.
content.summary: Light descending on imam reza shrine

content.detailedDescription:
Heading south on i-165 after 9pm a star on the hill on my left following us, my girl friend and i were in the car and she asked if i see that bright star, it's following us, i say what is it, she says a  ufo, i say i don't believe it, then it came down the hill from my left, i could tell it was flying because it didn't bounce like a bike or jeep coming down the hill, when it reached the gutters edge it expanded into a yellow-orange oval shape, and hovered over the road right in front of us for over 20 mins, so i dropped from normal headlights to parking lights only, then to no lights , then back up to parking lights only, then up to normal headlights again, hoping to communicate somehow i waited, soon it flashed a bright light from it's top and was gone. note, that the illumination the whole time as it was hovering there was brighter on the top and shined upward almost like a beam, and the skin was glowing yellow-orange. my dad was a pilot, i've flown with him alot and i'm well aware that this object was not man made. it had no stobe lights and no wings, no windows, and what kind of plane or helicopter glows!? 

i could through google earth give the exact latitude and logitude of this event. i've looked for my report in then past to make corrections. so here it is again only corrected this time. i have no doubts, this was not man-made.
content.summary: Bright white star too yellow-orange oval with brighter dome on top

content.detailedDescription:
I was followed by a vehicles bearing u.S. govt plates when i lived in florida in 2004 and was followed every day. my wife and other family members seen this as well.It has to do with what i was investigating.I moved to michigan in 2005 and i kept being followed there to. my wife's family in mi said to me "what did you get yourself into"? in october of 2006 i found myself being followed out of the lake orion,mi library.
                          i was traveling at 45 mph the vehicle behind me was traveling at same rate of speed.I sped up and started speeding at 80 mph and turned around going towards the vehicle,in my lane of course. the vehicle pulled off the road, and i stopped in my lane next to it.I made eye contact with a woman for like 8 to 10 seconds, then a gold illuminating like dust started appearing engulfing her body going slowly in a counter clockwise direction and in seconds,she was gone.
                         i have had these visions/thoughts since this encounter in which i cant explain.My life has not been the same since then.I only reported this to mr.Bill birnes of ufo magazine,and he suggested i report this to a man named maximillian delalafayette. i have not contacted him yet,i wanted to report it to your agency first.
                        it is scary to have visions/thoughts of the past and future of humanity. i have kept silent on this since 2006. i just thought who would believe me.Some of the visions/thoughts from the past include earth being nothing but "an animal planet,and an asteroid did not take out the dinosaurs,aliens did,and they took the dna from the chimpanzee and mixed it with theirs and made a hybrid race.
                        they are here on earth now,and have been since their creation of humanity.I know what they want from us for the future. i can be reached by cell at *(wit's telephone numbers and email address deleted -- cms/sg).

                                    sincerely,
                                             **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: A close encounter with alien being

content.detailedDescription: While house sitting at my sisters in elmira oregon, i was standing on here back pourch faceing east, cloud gazing when i noticed the sphere at about 1'o'clock apprearing just in front of a small slow moving (nxnw)thin cloud. it was brighter, or void of, the surrounding light blue sky. i went in side to get my camera. i noticed that the sphere had not moved from it's location after taking about 8 minutes to get my camera, but the cloud had passed on. i lined the spere up with a top to make sure it was not moving - it did not, for the entire duration of the viewing. it left my sight by slowly fading out. i was excited that it might be a planet visabl in broad daylight. i also noticed a shadow on it's backside facing away from the sun.
content.summary: Noticed the sphere while looking at clouds - thought it was a planet - took several digital photos.

content.detailedDescription: I am a county sheriff just outside pennsylvania. i have seen on many nights while working, a very large object, high in the sky, that flashes brilliantly bright multi-colored lights. the object is always silent and other officers are unsure of what it is. the object doesn't appear to be moving but ends up in different parts of the sky depending on the night. when compared to stars in the sky, it does not appear to be a star due the flashing of lights and does not appear to be a plane or helicopter. i first noticed it a year ago. it sometimes does not appear on clear sky nights. i attempted to take pictures and they did not develope.
content.summary: I have seen a non moving star-like object in the sky flashing bright lights for about a year now.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home this evening, i noticed a bright light in the southern sky, over hobbs, nm. the sky was very clear, and at first i thought it was a really bright star, because it was still. however, as i watched, i noticed that the object was pulsating with red and blue lights. then, i thought maybe it was a plane or helicopter, but it stayed low on the horizon for more than 1 hour in the same spot. now, i thought, would a helicopter really stay stationary in one spot for so long? i kept going back to look, because i really couldn't figure it out. i asked my husband to come out and look and see if he thought it was a plane or helicopter or star, but he thought it was weird, too.  this object stayed in one place for nearly 2 hours, pulsating with red, blue, and at times, white light. it was very bright, very large, and low in the sky. around 10 -10:30 pm, it started to move very, very slowly across the sky toward the southwest. i saw at least 4 airplanes fly near this object, which is also strange, because hobbs is a small town, and i rarely see airplanes flying over, day or night.
content.summary: Large pulsating  light

content.detailedDescription:
This is the latest and most dramatic of the sightings i had in january. prior to january, i have never seen anything i would have called a ufo.

 it was 7pm and i was going into safeway to pick up groceries. upon getting out of my car and walking toward the front door of safeway - i immediately notice a very intensely bright light glowing above the horizon. it looked to be about six or seven miles away and about 5000 feet up. the date was 1-28-2010. 

recognizing it as being similar to the other recent sightings, i stopped dead in my tracks and resolved to watch it until it played out. after about four minutes, it powered down to about 1/10 the original brightness. initially, it had been about like ten times the brightness of venus. 

it was interesting that i saw it from the grocery store parking lot. this is the store where i do most of my shopping. i noticed it because having experienced what i had already experienced in january, i am always looking up - particularly at that time of day. i immediately felt it was akin to the ones i had been seeing in january. 

so after dimming down, this first object moved away from the ocean for about twenty seconds. as it moved away, i began to notice the emergence of some red lights. as the object began to fade out of sight, a second identical object of equal brilliance, popped on. it was in exactly the same spot the first object had originated.

the second object hovered for about two minutes and it too "powered down" and began moving away from the ocean, going to exactly the same spot the first object had gone. in doing so, the second object also displayed some red lights at the end. then, it too, faded out of sight.

at this sighting, i was less scared than the one before - which i will have to explain later. i will say,at this point, that the previous sighting had been approximately over moss landing, ca. at about 7:15 in the evening on 1-28-2011.
content.summary: Two mini suns appear sequentially, each hovering for three minute, powering down to 1/10 brillance and departing to the same destination
